pullRequest.title: [java] Update many java rules
pullRequest.bodyText:
Describe the PR
Update many (104) Java rules to pmd 7. There are still 179 of them

This introduces a few new xpath functions, which are documented.
Use a common utility class to share logic between rules (JavaRuleUtil), or to store procedures that are not really rule-specific
Some rule base classes have been removed. In particular, AbstractJunitRule is turned into JUnitRuleUtil TestFrameworksUtil
Some rules have been converted to XPath (which is why they're shown as deleted).
I tried not to change the definition of rules. I implemented #2893 though

Related issues


Refs #2701
Fixes #342, #807, #1005, #1212, #1224, #1422, #1565, #1969, #1998, #2147, #2528, #2532, #2537, #2538, #2542, #2577, #2587, #2712, #2716, #2806, #2880, #2883

Ready?


 Added unit tests for fixed bug/feature

 Unit tests for new XPath functions are missing (done in #2917)


 Passing all unit tests
 Complete build ./mvnw clean verify passes (checked automatically by travis)
 Added (in-code) documentation (if needed)

commit.message: Convert some rules to XPath rules

Revert "Change UseConcurrentHashMap"

We can do that later

This reverts commit 21f26b75ab0d32ee5697e688a94784f5d2a53630.
Fix report location of enum constant

Check fixes #1969

Actually was fixed by #2800
Fix an error with old metrics code
Fix type vars with unresolved bounds being subtypes of anything
Ensure removed violations of UselessStringValueOf are not FNs

Improve exception handling for XPath queries

Now there is a specific exception type for XPath exceptions.
We add context values to help pinpointing the error
Add a fun to check for annotations

Update saxon version

Fixes bug https://saxonica.plan.io/issues/4610\?pn\=1\#change-16066

which occurs because of property inlining

Update DontImportJavaLang

Convert to xpath rule

Update EJB naming conventions

Also allow TypeTestUtil to not fail
if classpath is incomplete

Update UnnecessaryAnnotationValueElement

Convert to XPath rule

Update EmptyCatchBlock

Now it doesn't ignore InterruptedException/CloneNotSupportedException
Fix type test util for anons
Ensure TypeTestUtil throws on parameterized type
Fix report locations for var ids
